00043 /** Constructor. */
00044 QuantMethodExprCHPReport::QuantMethodExprCHPReport(AnalysisInfo& chpInfo, 
00045                                                    const std::string& prefix, 
00046                                                    const std::string& algName)
00047 {
00048   m_Info = chpInfo;
00049   m_AlgName = algName;
00050   m_Prefix = prefix;
00051   m_CurrentProbeSetCount = 0;
00052   Err::check(chpInfo.m_ProbesetNames.size() == chpInfo.m_NumProbeSets, "Error: QuantMethodExprCHPReport::QuantMethodExprCHPReport() - m_NumProbeSets(" + ToStr(chpInfo.m_NumProbeSets) + ") != m_ProbesetNames.size(" + ToStr(chpInfo.m_ProbesetNames.size()) + ")");
00053 }
00054 
00055 /**
00056  * Set the CHP filenames to use for output. This overrides any prefix and allows
00057  * the caller to place the chp files anyplace they are desired.
00058  * @param fileNames - Vector of fileNames with full path to output
00059  * file, one for each cel file.
00060  */
00061 void QuantMethodExprCHPReport::setChpFileNames(std::vector<std::string> &fileNames) {
00062   m_CHPFileNames = fileNames;
00063 }
00064 
00065 /** Destructor. */
00066 QuantMethodExprCHPReport::~QuantMethodExprCHPReport() {
00067 }
00068 
00069 /** Swap out the .cel for .chp */
00070 void QuantMethodExprCHPReport::setupFileNames(const IntensityMart &iMart) 
00071 {
00072         m_CELFileNames = iMart.getCelFileNames();
00073   if (m_CHPFileNames.size() == 0) {
00074     m_CHPFileNames = Fs::changeDirAndExt(m_Prefix,m_CELFileNames,"."+m_Info.m_AlgName+".chp");
00075   }
00076   if (m_CHPFileNames.size() != iMart.getCelFileNames().size()) 
00077     Err::errAbort("Must be same number of output CHP files (" + 
00078                   ToStr(m_CHPFileNames.size()) + ") as input CEL files (" + ToStr(iMart.getCelFileNames().size()));
00079 }
00080 
00081 /** Fill in a chp header file info. */
00082 void QuantMethodExprCHPReport::setupChpFile(affxchpwriter::CCHPFileWriter &chp, AnalysisInfo &info) 
00083 {
00084         assert(info.m_ParamNames.size() == info.m_ParamValues.size());
00085         chp.SetAlgorithmName(info.m_AlgName.c_str());
00086         chp.SetAlgorithmVersion(info.m_AlgVersion.c_str());
00087         chp.SetProgID(info.m_ProgID.c_str());
00088         chp.AddAlgorithmParameter("program-name", info.m_ProgramName.c_str());
00089         chp.AddAlgorithmParameter("program-version", info.m_ProgramVersion.c_str());
00090         chp.AddAlgorithmParameter("program-company", info.m_ProgramCompany.c_str());
00091         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < info.m_ParamNames.size(); i++) 
00092         {
00093                 chp.AddAlgorithmParameter(info.m_ParamNames[i].c_str(), info.m_ParamValues[i].c_str());
00094         }
00095 }
00096 
00097 /** 
00098  * Get set up for a run of reporting probesets. Often used to open file
00099  * streams and print headers to files etc.
00100  * 
00101  * @param qMethod - Quantification method to be used.
00102  * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00103  * 
00104  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00105  */
00106 bool QuantMethodExprCHPReport::prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart) 
00107 {
00108         setupFileNames(iMart);
00109 
00110         // Make sure our output directory exists.
00111   Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(m_Prefix, false);
00112 
00113         // Prepare headers for all CHP files.
00114     Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Initializing " + ToStr(m_CHPFileNames.size()) + " XDA CHP files", m_CHPFileNames.size(), 0, m_CHPFileNames.size());
00115         for(int target=0; target<m_CHPFileNames.size(); target++) 
00116         {
00117     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00118 
00119                 // Remove any existing CHP file
00120                 std::string chpName = m_CHPFileNames[target];
00121     Fs::rmIfExists(chpName, false);
00122     if (Fs::exists(chpName)) {
00123       Verbose::out(1,"Fs::exists returned true?");
00124       Err::errAbort("Unable to remove old CHP file, " + chpName);
00125     }
00126 
00127     // gen the name.
00128     std::string tmp_name=m_CHPFileNames[target] + ".tmp";
00129 
00130                 // Create tmp chp file
00131                 affxchpwriter::CCHPFileWriter chp;
00132 
00133     std::string tmp_unc_name=Fs::convertToUncPath(tmp_name);
00134                 chp.SetFileName(tmp_unc_name.c_str());
00135                 if(!chp.CreateNewFile()) {
00136       Err::errAbort("QuantMethodExprCHPReport::prepare() - Can't open CHP file '" +
00137                     FS_QUOTE_PATH(tmp_unc_name) + " to write."); 
00138     }
00139                 chp.InitializeForWriting(m_Info.m_NumRows, 
00140                              m_Info.m_NumCols, 
00141                              m_Info.m_NumProbeSets, 
00142                              m_Info.m_ChipType.c_str(), 
00143                              m_Info.m_ProbeSetType, 
00144                              false);
00145                 std::string fileRoot = Fs::basename(chpName);
00146                 chp.SetParentCelFileName(fileRoot.c_str());
00147                 setupChpFile(chp, m_Info);
00148                 Err::check(chp.SaveHeader(), "QuantMethodExprCHPReport::prepare() - "
00149                "Couldn't save header for file: "+FS_QUOTE_PATH(tmp_unc_name));
00150                 chp.Close();
00151     m_FilesForWriter.push_back(tmp_name);
00152         }
00153     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00154 
00155         // Initialize expression entry buffer writer.
00156         m_ExpressionEntryBufferWriter.Initialize(&m_FilesForWriter, false);     // false = Expression
00157 
00158         return true;
00159 }
00160 
00161 /** 
00162  * After every probeset computation this function is called an is an opportunity
00163  * to query the quantification method for results, residuals, etc.
00164  * 
00165  * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00166  * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00167  * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00168  * 
00169  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00170  */
00171 bool QuantMethodExprCHPReport::report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00172                                       QuantMethod &qMethod, 
00173                                       const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00174                                       std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00175                                       PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) 
00176 {
00177         QuantExprMethod *eMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(&qMethod);
00178         if(eMethod == NULL) { Err::errAbort("Can only use a QuantMethodExprReport with a QuantExprMethod."); }
00179         assert(!psGroup.probeSets.empty());
00180 
00181         // We only report expression probe sets.
00182         if(psGroup.probeSets[0]->psType != ProbeSet::Expression) { return false; }
00183 
00184         // Create an expression CHP result entry.
00185         affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults entry;
00186         for(int target=0; target<eMethod->getNumTargets(); target++) 
00187         {
00188                 entry.Detection = ABS_NO_CALL;
00189                 entry.DetectionPValue = 0.0f;
00190                 entry.Signal = eMethod->getSignalEstimate(target);
00191                 entry.NumPairs = m_Info.m_NumProbeSets;
00192                 entry.NumUsedPairs = m_Info.m_NumProbeSets;
00193                 m_ExpressionEntryBufferWriter.WriteExpressionEntry(target, entry);
00194         }
00195 
00196         m_CurrentProbeSetCount++;
00197 
00198         return true;
00199 }
00200 
00201 /** 
00202  * If a probeset fails to compute for whatever reason then this method is
00203  * called rather than the normal report call above. By default does nothing.
00204  * 
00205  * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00206  * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00207  * @param layout - Where the probesets, probes, etc are on the chip.
00208  * 
00209  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00210  */
00211 bool QuantMethodExprCHPReport::reportFailure(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00212                                              QuantMethod &qMethod, 
00213                                              const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00214                                              std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00215                                              PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) 
00216 {
00217         QuantExprMethod *eMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(&qMethod);
00218         if(eMethod == NULL) { Err::errAbort("Can only use a QuantMethodExprReport with QuantExprMethod."); }
00219         assert(!psGroup.probeSets.empty());
00220 
00221         // We only report expression probe sets.
00222         if(psGroup.probeSets[0]->psType != ProbeSet::Expression) { return false; }
00223 
00224         // Create a blank entry in order to be consistent with psGroups list.
00225         affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults entry;
00226         for(int target=0; target<m_CHPFileNames.size(); target++) 
00227         {
00228                 entry.Detection = ABS_NO_CALL;
00229                 entry.DetectionPValue = 0.0f;
00230                 entry.Signal = 0.0f;
00231                 entry.NumPairs = 0;
00232                 entry.NumUsedPairs = 0;
00233                 m_ExpressionEntryBufferWriter.WriteExpressionEntry(target, entry);
00234         }
00235 
00236         m_CurrentProbeSetCount++;
00237 
00238         return true;
00239 }
00240 
00241 /** 
00242  * No more probesets will be processed, this is a chance to finish outputting
00243  * results and clean up.
00244  * @param qMethod - Quantification method that was used.
00245  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00246  */
00247 bool QuantMethodExprCHPReport::finish(QuantMethod &qMethod) 
00248 {
00249         // Sanity to check we saw all the probe sets we were expecting.
00250         if(m_CurrentProbeSetCount != m_Info.m_NumProbeSets) 
00251         {
00252                 Err::errAbort("QuantMethodExprCHPReport::finish() - Expecting: " + ToStr(m_Info.m_NumProbeSets) +
00253                         " but got: " + ToStr(m_CurrentProbeSetCount) + ". GCOS XDA CHP file will be corrupt.");
00254         }
00255 
00256         // Flush remaining signal entries in the buffer.
00257         m_ExpressionEntryBufferWriter.FlushBuffer();
00258 
00259     // Remove .tmp extension
00260         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_CHPFileNames.size(); i++) 
00261         {
00262                 std::string orig = m_CHPFileNames[i] + ".tmp";
00263         if(!Fs::fileRename(orig.c_str(),m_CHPFileNames[i].c_str())) {
00264             // Try and remove all the CHP files
00265             Fs::rm(orig, false);
00266                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < m_CHPFileNames.size(); j++)
00267                     Fs::rm(m_CHPFileNames[j], false);
00268 
00269             Err::errAbort("Unable to rename " + orig + " to " + 
00270                         m_CHPFileNames[i]);
00271         }
00272         }
00273         return true;
00274 }
